content:
Welcome! I am a PhD Candidate in Economics at CEMFI. I﻿ am visiting Yale University during Fall 2023, let’s meet! You can reach me at sophie.nottmeyer@yale.edu.
My main field of research is development economics. My current work mainly focuses on technology adoption and contractual frictions in Sub-Saharan Africa. My projects have received funding from STEG and PEDL.
My CV is available here .
